title: User Roles
description: In this document, we will review the types of users that work and interact with the Qrvey Platform. There are 4 different types of users with access to the Qrvey Platform and embeddable components. Each of the user types relates to a particular aspect of the Qrvey platform. Admin users use the Admin Portal, Creators use the Business Analytics Application or widgets to create content for End Users, and Developers work with the embeddable widgets and APIs.
